title: Graphic Designer / Product Designer (3D, E-commerce & Video)
description:
I am looking for a skilled and detail-oriented Graphic Designer with strong experience in 3D product design, graphic design, e-commerce, and video editing. This role involves working closely with our team to design products, create marketing assets, and prepare files for mass production.



If you are creative, organized, and comfortable working with overseas suppliers, this role is for you.



Responsibilities:



1. Product Design

Create 3D product models using Fusion 360 (preferred) or similar software

Produce high-quality product renders using KeyShot or other rendering software

Prepare technical drawings for manufacturing



2. Graphic Design

Design product packaging and supporting documents

Create flyers, banners, and marketing materials

Use Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, and InDesign for all design assets



3. E-commerce

Design and update Shopify website visuals (banners, product images, layouts)

Video Editing

Edit videos for marketing and advertising (software of choice)



4. Supplier Coordination

Communicate with overseas suppliers regarding design files and mass production requirements



Required Skills & Software:

Fusion 360 (highly preferred)

KeyShot

Adobe Photoshop

Adobe Illustrator

Adobe InDesign

Any video editing software (Premiere Pro, After Effects, CapCut, etc.)



Working Hours:

10:00 AM – 6:00 PM AEDT (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)

Must be available during these hours



Qualifications:

Proven experience in graphic design and 3D product design

Strong attention to detail and ability to follow instructions

Good communication skills in English

Experience working with manufacturing or suppliers is a plus

Portfolio required (design, 3D renders, packaging, or videos)



How to Apply:

Please apply with:

Your resume

A portfolio link (Google Drive, Behance, or website)

A short introduction explaining your experience with Fusion 360

title: Video Editor (Long-Form & Short-Form Content)
description:
Applications that do not include all required items in the “to Apply” section will not be reviewed. We value attention to detail and the ability to follow instructions key traits for this role. If any part of this application is incomplete or missing, your submission will be automatically disregarded.?



About the Role:



We are seeking a versatile Video Editor skilled in producing both long-form content (YouTube

faceless videos, luxury watch tour videos) and short-form content (TikTok, Instagram Reels,

YouTube Shorts). You will transform raw footage into polished, engaging videos optimized for

each platform while maintaining consistent branding, pacing, and storytelling quality.



Key Responsibilities:



Editing & Post-Production

- Edit long-form videos for YouTube, including faceless content and high-quality luxury

watch tour videos.

- Create short-form videos such as TikToks, Reels, YouTube Shorts, and other social clips.

- Repurpose long-form videos into short, engaging bite-sized content.

- Add motion graphics, subtitles, transitions, animations, SFX, and music.

- Perform color correction, grading, audio clean-up, and overall quality refinement.

Creative & Strategy

- Collaborate with creative leads to understand briefs, objectives, and desired outcomes.

- Craft compelling narratives, pacing, and visual storytelling across all formats.

- Optimize content for platform-specific best practices (YouTube, TikTok, Instagram,

, etc.).

- Contribute creative ideas for content themes, visual direction, and storytelling approach.

Workflow & Asset Management

- Organize and maintain all media assets, project files, and working libraries.

- Manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines.

- Export and deliver videos in various formats, resolutions, and aspect ratios depending on

platform needs.



Requirements:



- Proven experience editing both long-form and short-form content (portfolio or demo reel

required).

- Proficiency in at least one major editing software: Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro,

DaVinci Resolve, or After Effects.

- Strong understanding of pacing, storytelling, rhythm, and audience retention strategies.

- Experience creating platform-optimized content for YouTube, TikTok, Instagram Reels,

and Shorts.

- Ability to maintain consistent branding and visual style across various content types.

- Strong organizational skills with high attention to detail.

- Ability to work in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.

- Comfortable using AI tools for editing and content generation

- Thumbnail creation and basic graphic design



Preferred Qualifications

- Experience with motion graphics and basic animation.

- Understanding of content analytics, audience retention data, and platform algorithms.



To apply, send the following:



1. Your DISC test - Take it here - 
/disc-personality-test/ - Please send a link to your results.

2. Your personality test - Take it here - 
/free-personality-test - Please send a link to your results.

3. Your updated resume, showcasing your most relevant experience.

4. Typing Test - Take this typing test (30 seconds): 





5. A video or videos that answer the following. Feel free to give as much information and context as possible. Also please make sure that, when you submit the video(s) links, they are in public, viewable format.



a. Tell us about yourself. Hobbies/passions. What are your career/life goals and in what amount of time?

b. Show off your work setup (computer/laptop, monitor(s), speakers, lights, etc) and tech setup - browser you use, other tech/platforms you use

c. Think of one objective you’ve had to complete in your current or previous role. Explain what metric(s) were you measured on (time spent, money saved, traffic/engagement/leads/sales, etc). Reverse engineer said objective with the target measurement in mind. Map out the process that you came up with in google docs, google sheets, or in Canva as a visual representation. How could you have made it easier/faster/better using AI?

title: FULLTIME Question Curator for Instagram (Remote| PH-based VA)
description:
We’re looking for a full-time Question Curator to join our team and help create high-performing question content for social media.



You’ll be working on content for our IG accounts under Flamingo Cards. This role is ideal for someone with strong judgment, great writing instincts, and an eye for what makes people want to answer (and share).



You do NOT need to be a “professional writer.” We care more about taste, structure, safety, and consistency. We’ll train you on our formats and what performs best.



What you’ll be doing:

*Curating and writing question sets for IG carousel posts

*Creating questions for themes like couples, friends, fun, deep, wholesome, etc.

*Turning a prompt/topic into 5 questions with intentional progression

*Making revisions based on feedback and performance data (link taps)



What we’re looking for:

*Strong English writing skills (simple, natural, not “AI sounding”)

*Excellent question judgment (knows what’s intriguing but still safe)

*Ability to follow formats and keep a consistent brand voice

*Taste for internet-friendly, scroll-stopping prompts (without being cringe)

*Comfortable writing lots of variations without repeating yourself

*Detail-oriented (spot duplicates, awkward phrasing, or overly similar prompts)

*Reliable internet connection

*Available for full-time work



Nice to have:

*Experience writing for social media marketing

*Familiarity with relationship / friendship / lifestyle content

*A small portfolio of writing samples (even a Google Doc is fine)



Salary, benefits, and growth:

*Starting salary is $400 per month (full-time)

*Performance-based raises

*We have tea
mbers who started at this level and now earn $1,000 per month after a couple of years

*Philippine holidays are observed

*13th month pay is provided

*This is a long-term role, not freelance or short-term



Why work with us:

*Stable, full-time position

*Supportive team that values improvement and consistency

*Training and guidance provided

*Clear growth path and raises for good performance

*Creative work you can be proud to ship (and see perform)



How to apply:

Please apply ONLY through this Google Form.

Do not send messages on onlinejobs.ph.



Application form link:

title: PR & Events Team: Content Producer
description:
ABOUT THE JOB

Are you a creative storyteller who knows how to turn ideas into engaging content that drives results? Penji is seeking a Content Producer to transform company initiatives, partnerships, and events into compelling content that captures attention and generates views. You'll take projects from the team—podcast episodes, event recordings, partner collaborations, campaign assets—& produce polished, engaging content optimized for maximum reach across platforms. This role demands both creative vision and technical execution: you need to understand what makes content shareable, how to hook viewers in the first 3 seconds, and how to repurpose one asset into multiple high-performing pieces. If you're obsessed with engagement metrics and love experimenting with formats that perform, apply to join Penji today.



ABOUT THE COMPANY

Since 2017, Penji has provided on-demand access to the top 2% of graphic designers. We're the leader in graphic design subscription services and have been recognized by Inc. Magazine as one of the fastest-growing companies.

Beyond our business success, we're a community-conscious startup dedicated to supporting nonprofits and those helping others. Graphic design is what we do. Being a responsible employer and supporting our communities is who we aim to be. Join us on our mission to leave a positive footprint.



QUALIFICATIONS

? 3+ years of content production experience with proven results driving views and engagement

? Portfolio demonstrating ability to create high-performing social media content (video clips, reels, shorts)

? Strong video editing skills (Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, CapCut, or similar)

? Understanding of platform-specific content optimization (YouTube, LinkedIn, Instagram, TikTok,
)

? Experience repurposing long-form content into multiple short-form assets

? Graphic design skills for thumbnails, quote graphics, and promotional materials

? Data-driven approach to content performance and willingness to iterate based on metrics

? Creative storytelling ability with understanding of hooks, pacing, and audience retention



RESPONSIBILITIES

? Content Production: Take raw materials (podcast recordings, event footage, interviews, presentations) and produce polished, engaging content optimized for each platform.

? Multi-Format Repurposing: Transform single pieces of content into multiple assets—video clips, reels, quote graphics, audiograms, blog snippets, social posts, and ad creatives.

? Engagement Optimization: Create content designed for maximum views using proven techniques—strong hooks, compelling thumbnails, platform-specific formats, and strategic editing.

? Video Editing: Edit podcast episodes, event recordings, and interviews into shareable clips with captions, graphics, b-roll, and engaging cuts.

? Graphic Design: Create eye-catching thumbnails, quote graphics, promotional images, and social media assets that drive clicks.

? Platform Strategy: Understand what works on each platform (YouTube vs. LinkedIn vs. Instagram) and adapt content accordingly.

? Performance Tracking: Monitor content performance metrics (views, engagement, watch time, click-through rates) and identify what's working.

? Experimentation: Continuously test new content formats, editing styles, thumbnail approaches, and distribution strategies to improve results.

? Content Calendar Management: Coordinate content production schedule to align with events, campaigns, and partnership initiatives.

? Trend Awareness: Stay current on content trends, viral formats, and platform algorithm changes to keep content relevant and discoverable.

? Quality Control: Ensure all content meets brand standards while remaining authentic and engaging.

? Collaboration: Work with partnerships, events, and marketing teams to understand content goals and align production with company objectives.

? Asset Library Management: Organize and maintain content library for easy repurposing and reference.

? Reporting: Provide regular reports on content performance, top-performing assets, and insights for future production.



HOW TO APPLY

Apply here:

Attach your portfolio or samples of relevant past work.

title: Senior SEO Strategist – Local Businesses & Google Maps Focus
description:
We’re Hiring: SEO Strategist for Local Businesses



We’re looking for an SEO strategist who can help a range of local companies from engineering firms to local shops and service providers, succeed in search. We need someone who’s not just ticking boxes, but actually building a repeatable, scalable system as we grow.



You’ll own the SEO strategy end-to-end for multiple local clients. That means diagnosing why a site isn’t ranking, designing the fixes, and leading the execution. If you have experience with Google Business Profile optimization and local map rankings, that’s a definite plus. We want someone who’s proactive, organized, and comfortable taking ownership. You should be able to communicate clearly in English, explaining not just how to do things, but why they matter.





In the long run, we want you to grow into a leadership role, helping to manage a small SEO team as we expand.





Key Responsibilities:

Full SEO ownership for diverse local businesses.

Diagnose issues (technical, content, local relevance) and implement solutions.

Execute local SEO strategies focused on real results (leads, bookings).

Handle keyword research, content planning, on-page optimization, and technical SEO audits.

Align SEO efforts with our overall offers and growth goals.

Help us build clear, repeatable processes and eventually lead a small team.





Must-Have Experience:

Proven SEO success with local businesses across different industries.

Strong technical, on-page, off-page, and local SEO knowledge.

Ability to create strategy, not just follow one.

Clear English communication skills.

Working Arrangement:

Full-time, remote, must overlap with hours similar to Singapore/KL/Philippines time zone.





If that’s you, we’d love to hear from you!

title: Virtual Assistant – Short-Term Rental (STR) Property Acquisition
description:
We are seeking an experienced Virtual Assistant to support our Airbnb arbitrage property acquisition efforts in the USA. The primary objective of this role is to identify and secure STR-approved rental properties efficiently, with the goal of finding at least one fully approved property within one week.



This role is ideal for a VA with proven experience in STR landlord outreach, cold calling, and property vetting who can work independently and produce consistent results.



Key Responsibilities:

Property Research & Outreach

• Research rental properties that meet predefined criteria (city, budget, bedroom count, etc.)

• Identify and locate landlord or property contact information

• Conduct outbound outreach via phone (primary) 

• Complete a minimum of 100+ outbound calls per day (cold and warm leads)



STR Vetting & Market Research

• Verify that properties are located in short-term rental–legal zones

• Confirm landlord approval for STR use (Airbnb, VRBO, etc.)

• Review and validate HOA rules and restrictions (if applicable)

• Assess lease terms for flexibility and STR compatibility

• Ask and document all required vetting questions to ensure compliance with local STR regulations



Tracking & Reporting

• Accurately track all leads, outreach attempts, conversations, and outcomes in Google Sheets

• Maintain organized and up-to-date records of property status and next steps

• Provide daily progress updates outlining outreach volume, responses, and qualified leads



?



Daily Expectations

 - 4 hours per day, 5 days per week

 - Consistent outbound outreach and follow-up

 - Clear, proactive communication throughout the workday

 - Strong negotiation skills 



Requirements

• ability to make high volume calls continuously back to back

• experience with STR/Airbnb landlord outreach or property acquisition

• Strong cold-calling experience and confidence speaking with property owners 

• Familiarity with STR regulations, zoning considerations, and HOA restrictions

• Ability to work independently with minimal supervision

• Excellent communication and organizational skills

• Reliable internet connection and phone calling capability

• ability to work within time zone of mountain standard time (MST) in USA (needs to be available within 9am-5pm MST)

• reliable connection 

?



Compensation & Incentives

• Paid trial week to assess performance and fit

• Opportunity for a long-term partnership

• Performance-based bonuses for properties that result in finalized deals



Performance bonuses:

- Deal finalized (signed lease) | 2,500–3,000 ? ~$45–$55 

-  At least 1–2 fully vetted STR-approved properties within a week

-  landlord approval confirmed

- Clean documentation



This will be a week trial, for a potential long term partnership with us

title: Executive Operations Virtual Assistant
description:

The ideal candidate will be female, 30 years or older, fluent in English, and equipped with excellent communication and critical thinking skills. This role requires someone dependable, resourceful, and committed to delivering efficient, high-quality results.

Take initiative to improve workflow and streamline processes.

Work on a variety of projects and tasks, ensuring attention to detail and on-time delivery.

title: Lead Settlement Negotiator (Legal/Collections)
description:
We are a high-volume U.S. collections law firm managing 150+ active lawsuits and we need a relentless Lead Negotiator to drive settlements. In this role, your success is measured by two things: the number of signed settlement agreements you secure and, more importantly, your daily output.



We expect high-volume outreach. Because we deal with debtors who want to avoid payment, you must be prepared to send out a high volume of
s every single day and follow up multiple times a week. When a defendant responds, you must react immediately to keep the 
ntum alive.



The goal is to get settlement agreements signed multiple times a week. This only happens through extreme consistency and persistence. If you are someone who enjoys the "chase," works fast, and is comfortable hitting high daily
 targets to move files forward, this is the position for you.



This is a full-time, exclusive position (9:30 AM – 6:00 PM EST). No side hustles or other jobs are permitted.



To apply, please submit a 1-minute Loom video introducing yourself and telling me why you think this is a good job for you. Any application without a video will be skipped over. Send a NEW video or I will not watch it. I look forward to meeting you.



Thank you.

title: E-commerce Customer Support Specialist
description:
Our client is looking for a Customer Support Specialist to manage customer inquiries across
, live chat, phone calls, and social media platforms. This role requires delivering consistent, empathetic, and on-brand support while resolving order, shipping, subscription, billing, and product-related concerns. The specialist will work directly within Shopify, TikTok Seller Center, Amazon Seller Central, Gorgias, and Zendesk, while maintaining accurate CRM documentation and identifying trends or issues that require escalation. The role also involves supporting peak volume periods, launches, promotions, and operational changes, with flexibility in scheduling and willingness to render overtime when needed.



Key Responsibilities:



- Multichannel customer support 
, chat, phone, social media moderation)

-  Order, shipping, subscription, billing, and product inquiry resolution

-  Shopify, TikTok Seller Center, and Amazon Seller Central support

-  CRM and workflow management (Gorgias, Zendesk)

-  Subscription platform support (Skio, Recharge, or similar)

-  WMS and fulfillment coordination (ShipStation or similar)

-  CRM hygiene, tagging, and documentation

-  Issue escalation, trend identification, and operational feedback

-  Support for launches, promotions, and high-volume periods



Qualifications:



- At least 1 year of ecommerce customer support or customer experience experience

- Hands-on experience using Gorgias, Zendesk, and Shopify

-  Experience supporting subscription platforms (Skio, Recharge, or similar)

-  Familiarity with fulfillment and shipping tools (ShipStation or similar)

-  Experience using AI tools to support customer service workflows

-  Strong written English communication skills

-  Comfortable engaging with customers on social media platforms

-  Highly organized, detail-oriented, and dependable

-  Able to work independently in a remote environment

-  Open to flexible schedules and overtime when required



Screening Questions:



1. Describe your experience handling high-volume ecommerce customer support using Gorgias, Zendesk, and Shopify. How do you structure your workflows to maintain speed, accuracy, and brand tone?



2. What ecommerce platforms or marketplaces have you supported (e.g., Amazon Seller Central, TikTok Seller Center), and what types of customer issues did you handle most frequently?



3. Are you willing to work flexible or shifting schedules and render overtime during peak volume periods when needed?



Qualified applicants must submit their resume, cover letter, and work samples to 
 that do not follow these instructions will not be processed.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:

 Ads, and Google Ads.

title: Intermediate Accountant (Work-From-Home)
description:
Harvest Advisory Philippines Inc. (HAPI) is seeking an Intermediate Accountant to join our domestic corporation in the Philippines. We are headquartered in Singapore under Harvest Accounting (
.sg) and support over 300 Singaporean small businesses in their bookkeeping, accounting, and taxation needs. Currently, we have about 6 Client Managers based in Singapore, and Malaysia and 12 Accountants based in the Philippines.



You'll play a key role in supporting Harvest Accounting in providing exceptional accounting services to our clients.

You must have had a minimum of 2 to 3 years of relevant bookkeeping and management accounting experience. Exposure to Singapore companies (FRS and tax law) is a bonus.



The role requires strong communication skills and the ability to work in a cross-cultural environment. You will have regular and independent communication with management, peers in finance, and other functions/business. You will be responsible for bookkeeping and full-set accounts preparation for a portfolio of customers ranging from small business owners to Finance-Admin staff and assist with issues on accounting, GST, tax, payroll, and Xero migration.



Responsibilities:

- Bookkeeping

- Reconcile accounts payable and receivable

- Manage balance sheets and profit/loss statements

- Work with production tea
mbers to prepare monthly management accounts using Xero cloud accounting ecosystem and its integrated solutions.

- Process operational accounting tasks such as monthly employee expense claims compilation and vendor payment cycles.

- Work with production tea
mbers to prepare workpapers, basic annual unaudited financial statements, and tax computation for simple clients.

- Prepare monthly or quarterly GST submissions for customers.

- Prepare submissions of Estimated Chargeable Income and final tax Form C/S on IRAS portal for basic / simple clients.

- Compute payroll and submission of CPF to CPF Board, submission of annual IR8A and IR21.

- Set up new Xero accounts including migration work, working with Client Managers to complete projects in a timely manner.

- Ensure all timelines and reporting deadlines are adhered to.

- Request basic documentation and respond to routine queries from customers and other stakeholders.

- Ensure good client feedback and customer satisfaction

- Suggest and identify suitable Xero-integrated apps or solutions (point-of-sales, inventory, payments, payroll) for accounting automation.

- Opportunity to progress to a junior reviewer role to review management accountants prepared by junior accountants



Requirements:

- Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree in Accountancy or any related program

- At least 2 years of relevant work experience is required for this position

- Experience in a BPO setting or handling multiple clients is an advantage

- Experience in software like Xero and Dext is preferred

- Must have a strong knowledge of Microsoft Excel

- Must have excellent English communication skills

- Should be meticulous and has a keen attention to detail? ??

- Fast worker and able to handle large workload

- Comfortable with large sets of data to identify variances and classify into various categories

- Must be willing to work Monday to Friday (8:00 AM to 5:00 PM MNL)



Technical Requirements:

- Bank reconciliations

- Prepayment and amortisations

- Fixed assets and depreciation

- Journals



Teamwork:

- You will be required to work in a team and complete work assigned by your Manager

- Attend and contribute to weekly workflow meetings.

- Opportunity to attend and present ideas and training during fortnightly Share and Learn sessions.



What you will get:

- Attractive salary package with full-time employment or freelancer arrangement

- Annual leave entitlement and health insurance benefits

- Performance-based variable bonus

- The opportunity to be part of a growing, vibrant team helping companies grow through trust and technology





How to apply:

- Interested applicants may apply via job portals or 

- Only successful candidates will be notified.

- If you want your application to stand out, please submit a video introducing yourself and why we should choose you!



About Harvest Accounting

A Xero Platinum Partner, Harvest Accounting is a digital-first accounting firm that is passionate about streamlining operational finance, reimagining workflows, and identifying suitable add-ons and technology from the Xero app ecosystem to help small businesses win. The firm won Xero Singapore’s Medium Accounting Partner of the Year award in 2023 and is a finalist for Xero Asia Large Accounting Partner of the Year 2024.



Harvest Accounting strives to build and foster a strong community of like-minded business partners to streamline and transform accounting operations through cloud technology and ecosystem solutions.



Find out more on the Harvest Accounting website or on Instagram,
, and LinkedIn.

title: Virtual Associate for FA - 2026 02 Feb
description:
This is an entry-level role, where the majority of knowledge and skills will be acquired through on-the-job training, paving the way for advancement to senior positions.



Are you seeking a full-time, long-term career that offers exceptional growth potential through advancement opportunities, along with a stable income and bonus incentives? Join our team if you have a keen eye for detail, an unwavering drive for productivity, and a strong sense of responsibility. If you possess self-motivation, assertiveness, and a strong work ethic, coupled with a positive outlook and the ability to excel in a fast-paced work environment, we invite you to reach out to us.



You will receive training and support for your work. Candidates without experience but willing to learn and grow are welcome.

This is for candidates who are keen to develop a professional career that allows you to work remotely and independently. There are career paths with promising future opportunities that have traditionally been accessible only through conventional means. However, our embrace of technology, good jobs are no longer restricted to traditional ways.



About Us

The business has collaborated with a highly acclaimed loan brokerage and independent financial advisory firm, along with several other partners, all of which are fully licensed by government authorities. We offer a diversified suite of financial services and solutions with a personalized approach.



With these partners, we have one of the largest, most-respected, and fastest-growing networks of advisers in the country. We provide sound and comprehensive financial advice at both individual and corporate levels.



Requirement

• Strong verbal and written English skills with a neutral accent.

• Knowledge of Chinese/Mandarin, whether verbal or written, is a significant advantage.

• Exceptional talent for natural conversation.

• Proficient in Microsoft Office applications.

• Owns a competent Windows computer/laptop and android mobile phone for work

• A dependable and consistent internet connection

• Consistent and reliable power supply without frequent outages.

• A distraction-free and quiet workspace.

• Utilizing a headset equipped with Noise Cancellation technology.

• Takes initiative and works independently to address challenges, consistently seeking solutions.



Other Matters

We will be communicating via various communication tools. There will be a probation period for one to three months, depending on your qualifications and experience, which is negotiable. Upon the completion of your probation period, you will become eligible for a 13th-month bonus, paid time off, and a range of employee benefits, including PhilHealth and the Social Security System. The annual performance bonus is determined by your key performance indicators (KPIs). You will follow the time zone of the Philippines. Among colleagues, your working hours may be arranged in rotation, including weekdays and weekends. A total work week of 40 hours. Your further potential salary growth will be based on your performance, which may be increased during the quarterly review.



Loan Support

You will learn on the job to handle the primary job scope that includes:

• Engage with incoming leads primarily through WhatsApp on our business phone.

• Create comprehensive reports that incorporate inputs and details provided by clients.

• Create concise summaries and propose options for clients, utilizing templates for efficiency.

• Collaborate with the designated bankers to facilitate the processing of loan applications

• Schedule meetings with clients and bankers.

• Reach out to current clients as they approach the end of their loan lock-in period.

• Oversee client relationships and enhance processes through multiple CRM platforms.



Insurance and Investment Support

You will learn on the job to handle the primary job scope that includes:

• Prepare the required documentation for the client's application, available in various systems.

• Reach out to clients through WhatsApp using our business phone, primarily to provide reminders and follow-ups.

• Utilize WhatsApp (business phone) as the main channel to engage clients and schedule appointments effectively.

• Craft client proposals utilizing the provided templates.

• Helping clients with insurance claims

• Contact insurers to obtain quotes and provide recommendations to clients.

• Oversee client relationships and streamline processes through a range of CRM systems.



Candidates who have shown capability and knowledge may be groomed towards senior roles or management roles.



Application

To apply for the job:

Please log in and click the link below to apply, and please follow the instructions.



There will be an assessment and a Microsoft Teams interview video call required, if you are shortlisted.

Customer
 management

title: Audio Editor
description:
I’m looking for a skilled audio editor to support my growing library of guided meditations and soundscapes. This role is focused on clean, high-quality spoken-word audio, not podcast or YouTube-style editing.



You’ll be helping shape audio that people listen to for rest, regulation, and presence. Precision, restraint, and consistency matter more than flashy production.



This is ongoing work with regular volume as the library continues to expand.



WHAT YOU’LL BE WORKING ON



Guided meditations (spoken voice layered with music)

Soundscapes and ambient audio

Meditation tracks for platforms such as Insight Timer, Spotify, and web playback



The final audio should feel:



Calm

Clean

Warm

Professional

Free from distractions



This is not fast, loud, or heavily produced audio. Subtlety and care are essential.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES



Clean and enhance vocal recordings

Remove background noise, clicks, and distracting breaths

Layer background music smoothly beneath spoken voice

Balance EQ, compression, and volume for warmth and clarity

Ensure consistent loudness and smooth transitions

Export files in required formats

Follow clear creative direction and file-naming conventions



REQUIRED SKILLS & EXPERIENCE



Proven experience editing spoken-word audio



Strong understanding of:



Voice clarity

Music layering

Volume leveling and consistency



Experience using audio editing software such as:



Audacity

Adobe Audition

Logic Pro

Pro Tools

Reaper (or similar)



High attention to detail

Ability to work cleanly, calmly, and consistently



Experience with meditation, hypnosis, audiobooks, voiceover, or wellness audio is a strong plus.



WHAT YOU DON’T NEED



No video editing

No social media work

No marketing or posting

No writing

This role is audio-only.



WORKFLOW & COMMUNICATION



I will provide:



Raw voice recordings

Music tracks or clear direction

Specific notes and expectations

Turnaround times will be reasonable and discussed in advance. Communication will be clear, respectful, and consistent.



IDEAL CANDIDATE



You may be a great fit if you:

Enjoy working with calming, intentional audio

Have a good ear for subtle details

Prefer clean, restrained production over heavy effects

Are patient, focused, and detail-oriented

Can receive feedback and refine work smoothly



HOW TO APPLY



Please include the following in your application:



A short introduction and overview of your experience



The audio software you use



1–3 samples of spoken-word audio you’ve edited

(guided meditation, audiobook, voiceover, or similar)



Your hourly rate or per-project rate



Your weekly availability



Applications without relevant audio samples will not be considered.



FINAL NOTE



This is a long-term opportunity for the right editor. If you value quality, calm, and consistency in your work, I would love to hear from you.



Thank you for your interest,

Julianne

title: Operations Graphic Designer
description:
About Us

We are a fast-growing e-commerce shoe brand focused on creating stylish, high-quality footwear and delivering a seamless online shopping experience. We move fast, test often, and care deeply about brand consistency and performance.

We’re looking for an Operations Graphic Designer who thrives at the intersection of design, execution, and efficiency—someone who can turn ideas into polished visuals while supporting daily operational needs.



Role Overview

As an Operations Graphic Designer, you’ll support the day-to-day creative needs of the business—from marketing assets to website visuals—ensuring designs are on-brand, on-time, and optimized for performance.

You’ll work closely with marketing, e-commerce, and operations teams to keep creative workflows running smoothly.



Key Responsibilities

Design marketing assets for
 campaigns, ads, social media, and website elements

Create and update product visuals (thumbnails, lifestyle images, size charts, promos)

Support Shopify website updates (graphics for collections, landing pages, promos)

Ensure brand consistency across all platforms and materials

Manage multiple design requests while meeting deadlines

Optimize creative assets for conversion and performance

Organize design files and maintain creative documentation

Collaborate with cross-functional teams for launches and campaigns



Qualifications

Proven experience as a Graphic Designer (e-commerce or DTC experience is a plus)

Proficiency in Canva and Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator)

Familiarity with Figma for design collaboration and workflow

Strong understanding of digital marketing design 
, paid ads, social media)

Experience designing for Shopify or e-commerce platforms

Strong attention to detail and time management skills

Ability to work in a fast-paced, operations-driven environment

Solid foundation in branding, typography, and layout principles

Familiar with Sanity (not a requirement, but a plus)



Nice to Have

Experience in the fashion or footwear industry

Motion graphics or basic video editing skills

Understanding of CRO or performance-based design

Familiarity with project management tools (ClickUp, Asana, Trello)



What We Offer

Competitive salary

Remote Work

Opportunity to grow with a scaling e-commerce brand

Creative freedom with clear brand direction

With Paid Time-Off

title: Sales and customer support
description:
Job Description

Appointment Setter & Sales Support (Commission-Only Contractor)



Company: So Money Pty Ltd

Work Type: Remote (Philippines)

Contract Type: Independent Contractor

Compensation: 100% Commission – Uncapped Earnings



About So Money



So Money is a solution-based mortgage manager working with mortgage brokers across Australia. We specialise in non-bank lending solutions, including self-employed, expat, and foreign resident home loans.



We provide strong backend processing, fast turnaround times, and warm lead support — allowing sales-focused contractors to concentrate on conversion and results.



Role Overview



We are looking for highly motivated, commission-driven Appointment Setters & Sales Support Contractors to work remotely from the Philippines.



Your primary focus will be calling warm leads, qualifying prospects, and booking appointments for our loan consultants, while providing light sales support to improve conversion outcomes.



This role is 100% commission-based and best suited for individuals confident in performance-based income.



Key Responsibilities

Appointment Setting



Call warm leads provided by So Money



Qualify prospects based on basic loan criteria (loan purpose, income type, LVR, residency status)



Book qualified appointments with loan consultants



Conduct consistent follow-ups to maximise appointment attendance



Maintain accurate CRM records and call notes



Sales Support



Introduce basic loan solutions and explain next steps to prospects



Assist with collecting initial information and documents



Follow up on missing information before consultant appointments



Support consultants by improving appointment-to-application conversion



Commission Structure



This is a commission-only contractor role.



Commission paid per qualified appointment and/or settled loan



No base salary or hourly pay



Uncapped earning potential



High performers can scale earnings significantly



(Exact commission rates and payout structure will be discussed during onboarding.)



Performance Metrics (KPIs)



Outbound call activity



Qualified appointments booked



Appointment show-up rate



Conversion rate from appointment to application



CRM accuracy and follow-up discipline



Requirements

Essential



Strong English communication skills (spoken and written)



Confident making outbound calls



Results-driven and resilient



Self-disciplined in a remote work environment



Previous appointment setting, telesales, or call centre experience



Preferred



Experience working with Australian or international clients



Mortgage, lending, or financial services exposure



Who This Role Is For



Commission-driven sales professionals



Appointment setters comfortable with performance-based income



Individuals seeking remote work with no income cap



People confident in follow-ups and closing appointments



Who This Role Is NOT For



Candidates seeking fixed salary or hourly pay



Those uncomfortable with targets or commission-only structures

title: Remote Google Ads (MCC) Account Manager – Sales & Performance Reporting
description:
Remote Google Ads (MCC) Account Manager – Sales & Performance Reporting

How to Apply



Interested applicants may submit their updated CV together with a short summary of their experience managing multiple Google Ads accounts (including MCC experience) to:







Please include examples of accounts handled and reporting responsibilities.

Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.



About the Role



We are looking for an experienced Google Ads professional who has managed multiple ad accounts under an MCC structure. This remote role focuses on overseeing advertising performance, maintaining account organization, and providing clear daily revenue reporting.



The ideal candidate understands how to manage several campaigns simultaneously while maintaining strong control over budgets, performance metrics, and sales tracking.



Key Responsibilities



Manage multiple Google Ads accounts through MCC



Monitor campaign performance across Search, Display, and Shopping



Optimize budgets to improve ROAS and overall account efficiency



Track and report daily sales performance and ad spend



Maintain organized account structures and billing accuracy



Identify underperforming campaigns and recommend improvements



Coordinate performance insights with internal teams



Required Qualifications



Proven experience managing Google Ads accounts under MCC



Ability to oversee multiple accounts at the same time



Strong understanding of performance metrics (ROAS, CPA, CTR, conversion rate)



Experience tracking and reporting daily sales results



Confident using spreadsheets for performance reporting



Good English communication skills



Reliable remote work setup with stable internet



Preferred Experience



Background in e-commerce or product-based advertising



Experience handling international ad accounts



Strong analytical skills and structured reporting approach



Position Details



Fully remote opportunity



Long-term position



Performance-focused working environment



We are seeking a structured, responsible, and data-driven Google Ads professional who can confidently manage multiple accounts while ensuring accurate daily revenue reporting and stable campaign performance.

title: Business Development Assistant - RCR26001
description:
Business Development Assistant (Contract | Flexible | Remote)



Job Reference: RCR26001



We’re hiring a Business Development Assistant to support The LinkedIn Strategist and Business Development Mastery Program, based in Australia. This role is perfect for someone who is highly organised, proactive, outcome-driven, and confident in managing multiple moving parts across CRM, content, and client communications. You’ll provide comprehensive support across networks, databases, content, follow-ups, and events while keeping projects, campaigns, and initiatives on track from start to finish.



What You’ll Do

  • Maintain and update audience, network, mobile, and follow-up databases

  • Track communications and ensure timely engagement with leads on
, LinkedIn, and WhatsApp

  • Support event planning, scheduling, and follow-up while coordinating administration, maintaining logs of attended and hosted events, and recording post-event engagement.

  • Organise tasks and projects in Asana, build project plans, and monitor progress

  • Prepare action minutes fro
etings outlining responsibilities and deadlines (who needs to deliver what by when)

  • Follow, update, and improve Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs)

  • Build and maintain reporting tools in Google Sheets and track metrics

  • Prepare and share content across LinkedIn,
 newsletters, and other platforms

  • Prepare presentations and reports as needed that are succinct and professional

  • Ensure tasks are completed right the first time, communicate updates clearly, and maintain a quality-first mindset in all deliverables



Tools You’ll Use

Asana, Google Sheets, Eventbrite, Mailchimp, Linktree, LinkedIn, Canva, Substack



Skills & Expertise Required

  • Super Organised

  • Asana Expert

  • Process

  • Procedure

  • Project Admin

  • Action Minutes

  • Project Plans

  • Google Sheets

  • Quality First

Our Culture

title: Customer Experience Representative
description:
Job Title: Customer Experience Representative

Rate: $3 up to $5/hour (based on experience)

Schedule: Must be available to work during the US (PST) time zone. 30 to 40 hours per week



We are seeking a Customer Experience Representative to join our dynamic team! This role is ideal for someone who excels at communication, learns quickly, and thrives in a fast-paced, customer-focused environment.



Challenge:

-As part of your application, please create a 60-second video or audio answering the following scenario:

"How would you defuse a disgruntled customer whose Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) was late?"

-Your response should clearly describe your approach to handling the situation.

-Please do not exceed one minute, and do not include any personal or work experiences in your answer.



Requirements:

-Send a picture of your computer specs.

-Has a reliable internet connection and the ability to work with a dual-monitor setup



Preferred Qualifications:

-1-2 years of experience in a BPO environment is an advantage.



How to Apply:

-Send your resume, the required video/audio, and your computer specs.

-Include the answer to this question in the
 subject line: What color do you get when you combine red and yellow?



Note: Only applicants who follow these instructions will be considered. Join us and grow your career with our amazing team!

title: Wordpress Developer
description:
Applications that do not include all required items in the “How to Apply” section will not be reviewed. We value attention to detail and the ability to follow instructions—key traits for this role. If any part of this application is incomplete or missing, your submission will be automatically disregarded.?



Senior WooCommerce / WordPress PHP Developer



Hi! My name is Wilson. I love cars and watches — and so do our clients. 

My company helps people shop for their dream cars and luxury watches, and our website, CRM, and tech stack are at the heart of this mission. 

We’re looking for an elite, multi-disciplinary WooCommerce & WordPress PHP developer who can engineer complex systems, design high-converting user experiences, and automate business workflows end-to-end.

This role blends backend engineering, system architecture, automation logic, and conversion-focused UI/UX design. You should be equally comfortable writing custom PHP, designing user portals, integrating CRMs, and laying out pages that convert.

What We’re Looking to Build:

Customer Portals & Gated Experiences

Secure customer login systems, dashboards, and account-based portals

Gated, role-based, and membership-style user experiences

CRM Integrations & Data Synchronization

Zoho CRM and GoHighLevel integrations covering contacts, deals, pipelines, custom fields, workflows, and webhooks

Two-way data synchronization between WooCommerce, CRMs, and external systems

Automation & Workflow Engineering

WooCommerce and CRM-driven automation workflows 
, SMS, internal notifications)

Zapier, Make, Pabbly, and n8n integrations, including custom middleware when needed

Reliable, observable, and secure automation systems

UI/UX Design & Conversion Optimization

Conversion-optimized landing pages, product pages, checkout flows, and customer portals

Content-to-layout structuring with intentional hierarchy, spacing, and typography

CRO-focused user journeys and interaction design

Performance, Security & Reliability

Secure authentication, data handling, and access control

Performance-optimized WordPress, WooCommerce, and database systems



Who You Are

Expert-level WordPress and PHP developer, skilled in custom plugins, themes, and backend logic

Experienced in integrations and automation, including APIs, webhooks, and CRM systems (Zoho, GoHighLevel)

Strong understanding of UX and conversion-focused design that supports the sales process

Proactive, solution-oriented, and detail-obsessed with a strategic mindset

Able to translate business needs into technically sound, high-performing solutions

How to Apply; Please submit the following:



Personality Test

Your 16Personalities test result link 
/free-personality-test. We’ll work closely together, so personality fit matters.

Video Introduction

Record a short video introducing yourself (mention my name — Wilson!).

Show your workspace setup.

Tell me why you think you're a perfect fit for this role.

I understand you may be shy; the video is an opportunity to show you can step outside your comfort zone and grow.



Screen Recording of Your Work

Show examples of custom WordPress and PHP work you've done.

Walk me through your code or specific builds.

Examples of automation workflows you’ve built using Zapier / Make / Pabbly / n8n

Examples of Zoho / GoHighLevel integrations

Show me how you manage your tabs, windows, and workflow setups — if you change configurations depending on what you’re coding, show those too!



Your Resume

Include your background, experience, and notable projects.

title: SEO Copywriter / Content Writer
description:
Applications that do not include all required items in the “How to Apply” section will not be reviewed. We value attention to detail and the ability to follow instructions—key traits for this role. If any part of this application is incomplete or missing, your submission will be automatically disregarded.?



About Us:

We are a luxury watch-focused brand looking to elevate our content strategy. Our audience values detailed, accurate, and engaging content about high-end watches like Rolex, Patek Philippe, Audemars Piguet, Omega, and more. We are seeking a talented SEO Copywriter/Content Writer who combines creativity with technical SEO skills to help us deliver content that ranks and resonates.



Responsibilities:



- Write high-quality, human-sounding content using AI tools where appropriate.

- Conduct in-depth research on luxury watches and related topics.

- Implement SEO best practices, including on-page optimization, keyword research, internal linking, and contextual linking with effective anchor text.

- Format content for WordPress and Elementor, including basic HTML formatting.

- Apply basic LLM (Large Language Model) optimization techniques for content clarity and engagement.

- Create simple graphics or visuals using Canva to complement content.

- Stay up-to-date with SEO trends and best practices.



Requirements:



- Proven experience as a content writer, copywriter, or SEO writer.

- Familiarity with WordPress and Elementor; ability to format HTML.

- Basic understanding of SEO and LLM optimization.

- Experience with keyword research and internal linking strategies.

- Strong research skills, attention to detail, and ability to write accurately about luxury watches.

- Knowledge and passion for luxury watches (Rolex, Patek Philippe, Audemars Piguet, Omega, etc.) is a must.

- Experience writing for B2C audiences preferred.

- Basic graphic design skills using Canva.

- Eager to learn and adapt to new tools and strategies.



Why Join Us:

Work remotely with a flexible schedule.

Collaborate with a passionate team focused on luxury watch content.

Opportunity to expand your skills in SEO, content creation, and luxury brand marketing.



How to Apply





To help me get to know you better, please send:





1. Your DISC test - Take it here - Please send a link to your results/confirmation page (not a screenshot).





2. Your personality test - Take it here - Please send a link to your results/confirmation page (not a screenshot).





3. Your updated resume, showcasing your most relevant experience.



4. Typing Test - Take this typing test (30 seconds): 





5. A video or videos that answer the following. Feel free to give as much information and context as possible. Also please make sure that, when you submit the video(s) links, they are in public, viewable format.





a. Introduce and tell us about yourself. Hobbies/passions. Career/life/financial goals and in what amount of time? Be very specific here. What have you been saving money for? What specific item/asset is it? When do you expect to acquire it? How do you plan on achieving that goal?





b. Show off your work setup (computer/laptop, monitor(s), speakers, lights, etc) and tech setup - browser you use, other tech/platforms you use.





c. Think of one objective you’ve had to complete. What metrics were you measured on? (time, money, etc) Reverse engineer the objective with the target measurement in mind. Map out the process that you came up with in google docs, google sheets, or in canva as a visual representation. How could you have made it easier/faster/better using AI?



5. Submit your resume, portfolio, and 1–2 writing samples (preferably luxury watch-related) demonstrating your SEO and content skills. Include a brief note about your favorite luxury watch and why.



6. Complete the short writing task:

title: CAD Drafter/Renderer - Kitchen (2020 Design)
description:

The ideal candidate is highly detail-oriented, organized, and familiar with 2020 Design. Experience with cabinetry layouts, kitchen construction details, and strong communication skills to collaborate with designers and project teams is preferred.



Must apply using this link,

title: E-commerce video editor and graphic designer
description:
Hey there! We’re an ecommerce company called Breev. We offer a natural alternative to vaping and smoking - helping people quit their bad habit.



We're on the hunt for a
 Ads Video Editor and Graphic Designer to join our team. Your mission? To collaborate closely with the founders to scale our Shopify brand to multiple 7 & 8-figures.



???? Important! As much as we love growth & development, if you do NOT have direct experience working with making
 Ads for E-commerce brands, unfortunately, this role is not for you… But if you do ????



????  Breev, whilst still in its infancy, is growing rapidly across the UK, so we need 2 part time video editors and graphic designers to help take us to the next level, so we can all enjoy the spoils.

 

???? Who Are We Looking For



We have one golden rule at Breev: you must have the DESIRE to grow. If you're not passionate about personal and professional growth, this isn't the company for you.



The purpose of the
 Ads Video Editor and Graphic Designer at Breev is to make high-converting ads which resonate with our customers and align with the business strategy. You will be given creative briefs to bring to life, utilising our own content as well as some content your source online.



As a creative editor, you must:

- Have experience in making video ads for

- Have experience making static ads

- Have experience digesting creative briefs

- Good at implementing constructive feedback

- Iterate on ideas

- Analyse the ads with a critical eye to make sure it aligns with the brief

- Source content online



We expect the person that joins our team to have the following traits:

- Works efficiently to a high standard 

- Is their own critic

- Has the desire to GROW (as we grow, your earnings will too)

- Takes feedback on board

- Spends time improving their skillset

- Care about what they do

- We want HUNGER



???? Your Responsibilities at Breev?



- Work closely with the founder to bring visions to life

- Deliver work in line with deadlines

- Expand on briefs utilising your own expertise

- Maintain organised creative folders

- Be a voice in the team, not just a yes-person





???? More Reasons to Join Breev



As a video editor and graphic designer, any winning ads you create will result in a bonus of $200 per concept with no cap - making the earning potential extremely high. With multiple ads being created each day or week, this could be a significant amount for the right person.



We also support your development if you show promise, and offer paid-for courses to up-skill yourself permanently in the world of e-commerce marketing.





????How does this work



We hold our tea
mbers to the highest standards and reward stellar work. Expect your rates to rise rapidly as you excel. Ready to join us? Here's our hiring process:



1. Apply with a Loom Video introducing yourself and experience.



2. First stage Interview 



5. Reference Check & Final Interview





If this resonates with you, let's chat! Choose the number associated with the core value you feel aligns with you the most and include it in your application. Looking forward to hearing from you!



CORE VALUES:



 1 - ???? RESULTS OBSESSED



 2 - ???? ATTENTION TO DETAIL 



3 - ?? ACCELERATED EXCELLENCE 



4 - ???? RELENTLESS OWNERSHIP 



5 - ???? PREPARED TO WIN 



6 - ???? COLLABORATIVE INNOVATION 



7 - ???? NEVER NOT GROWING





Apply now and let's accomplish our goals together! ????

title: Sales Executive
description:
About Us



Alpha Technical Training (ATT) is a rapidly growing Australian RTO on a mission to transform vocational education. We deliver blended learning solutions that give tradespeople across Australia the skills and licenses they need – without the traditional limitations of classroom-based learning.





Your Role



You’ll be responsible for converting leads into enrollments, delivering a professional and supportive experience from first contact to course commencement. This role blends sales performance with genuine care, ensuring students feel informed, confident, and excited to begin their learning journey.





As a Sales Executive, you’ll be the first point of contact for prospective students—guiding them through course options, answering queries, and ensuring a smooth, supportive enrollment experience. You’ll work closely with our Admin and Student Support teams to deliver a seamless onboarding process and maintain high satisfaction throughout the student lifecycle.





Key Responsibilities



Engage and convert inbound leads through phone,
, and CRM platforms

Understand student goals and recommend suitable training programs

Maintain accurate records of lead status, conversion rates, and student interactions

Collaborate with Admin and Student Support teams to ensure smooth onboarding

Conduct courtesy calls and check-ins during the student lifecycle

Uphold a high standard of professionalism and empathy in all communications

Contribute to continuous improvement by sharing student feedback and insights





What We’re Looking For



Experience in sales, student recruitment, or customer service (Edutech or RTO preferred)

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

Strong follow-up discipline and MS Office proficiency

Empathetic, proactive, and solutions-focused mindset

Familiarity with Australian education systems or vocational training (preferred)

Ability to work independently and collaborate across hybrid teams

title: VA Admin Support
description:
We’re looking for an Administrative Agent to help support our sales and recruiting teams. This is an entry-level position that is eligible for promotion after 12 months of tenure.



***********MAKE SURE YOU READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION********

***********MAKE SURE YOU READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION********

***********MAKE SURE YOU READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION********



You will fail the application process if you don't read the entire job description.



***********MAKE SURE YOU READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION********

***********MAKE SURE YOU READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION********

***********MAKE SURE YOU READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION********





About Us



Started in 2017, and we're growing like crazy.

We expect to hire at least 4 salespeople, 3 admins, and 3 marketers in 2026.

Growing FAST - We sold 2663 lessons in 2025, and we're on pace to sell 3328 lessons in 2026

A small team of 1 American and 10 Filipinos.

We sell manual transmission driving lessons in the United States. Yes, really.

100% inbound leads from Organic Search (SEO). We don’t do cold calling.

No competition - in 90% of the markets we serve, we have no competitors. Because of this, our sale is pretty easy to make.





Compensation and Benefits

Competitive commission package - $3.50 per hour

Paid 5 Sick Days - Effective on day 1

Paid 10 days vacation - Prorated

Paid 14 Bank holidays - (Legal and religious Holidays are country-specific)

Paid Birthday Off - you pick a day off

Business Continuity Plan - In cases of calamity $40 hotel accommodations are permitted to ensure work will continue



Type of Employment

Full Time

40 hours per week

Schedule - 9 AM to 5 PM EST



Benefits to be provided after completion of 3 months:

Health Insurance

Office equipment, home office furniture, and anything else you need for work

Learning books, courses, training, or coaching that you want



Benefits to be provided after completion of one year:

Paid two weeks off for the Christmas Season



Entry Level Details

Note that this is an entry-level job.

We do NOT expect you to have any prior sales experience.

If you’re looking to switch careers and get your foot in the door, this could be great for you.

This is a great opportunity for anyone with a background in any of the following areas: Customer Service, VA Admin, Admin Data Processing, Clerk,
 Communications, General VA, Admin Support, Sales and Admin Specialist, Administrative Support, Operations Admin, Executive Admin Assistant, Sales Assistant.





Duties and Responsibilities

New Orders - Processing Product Order (Gift Certificate)

New Orders - Initial Order Confirmation (Level 3)

Instructor Onboarding, Offboarding and Reonboarding

Reactivate Unavailable Instructor

Secret Message: When you apply, under the section that says "Is there anything else you'd like to write or include?", write the word PINK ELEPHANT. This will show us that you read the entire job description.

Duplicate Record Check

Updating the "Daily Tracking" Process

CTM Prospect Staging





Qualifications

At least 2-3 years of minimum work experience in a relevant or equivalent role

Comprehensive background in Customer and Administrative support

High level of accuracy and attention to detail

Excellent English communication and comprehension

Proficiency in using and managing Google applications - Gmail, Calendar, Documents, Drive

Preferably with knowledge in using cloud-based CRM

Organized and has careful attention to detail

Ability to multitask, prioritize, and manage time effectively

Strong Problem-Solving skills

Customer Service Oriented and the ability to adapt/respond properly to different types of scenarios

Equipped with good skills in office/admin management, and can suggest process improvements

Must have your own computer, reliable high-speed internet, and a good quality headset and microphone.





What's Hard About This Job

Working Remotely - We're a remote-first company, and we never want to have an office. This is great if you like working by yourself in the quiet, but it can be terribly painful if you need the energy of coworkers nearby.

Our Cultural Values - We're an American company with an incredibly unusual culture. Even by American standards, our 7 cultural values are highly unusual. Our culture is challenging for people accustomed to corporate culture and especially difficult for people who grew up in Confucian cultures. It's a great culture for people who speak directly and have a great deal of self-confidence and ownership. If you identify as a misfit, you'll do well.

Multiple Software Systems - You're going to need to learn how to use 12 different software systems. This is great if you want to get exposed to and experience lots of technology, but it can be tough if you have a hard time learning technology. Secret Message - When you apply, you'll see a box that asks if you want to add anything else. Type in PINK ELEPHANT in all capital letters exactly as we've shown it here.





Cheat Code for getting a job with us:

1) Our application comprises the majority of our recruiting process. Because of that, we suggest that you give us thoughtful responses and rich stories. We typically only interview applicants who give rich and detailed answers to our questions. If you write short responses so that you can hurry up and finish the application, you will not get interviewed.

2) Tell us stories about how your actions match your beliefs and values. For example, if I say I value health and fitness, you don't know if I'm telling you the truth or if I'm just telling you what sounds good. But, if I tell you things I've done, I can illustrate my values of health and fitness with proof. For example, I go to the gym 4 days per week, I've done 6 triathlons, including an Ironman, and I can swim 3000 meters in one hour. My examples of things I've done prove that my actions match my values system.

3) Be vulnerable and honest. We take very detailed notes during the interview process, and we conduct extensive background checks. If the stories you tell about yourself don't match what your references say, we will not hire you. We'd rather hire a C student who is honest about being a C student than someone who is a C student but tries to pass themselves off as an A student. Remember, this is an entry-level job. We're not looking for perfect. We're looking for an excellent cultural fit.





How to apply: Please click on the link: 
/work-opportunities/administration-agent

title: Sales & Follow-Up Virtual Assistant (AU Account)
description:
About us

We’re a growing moving company based in Brisbane, Australia. We’re looking for a confident, tech-savvy Virtual Assistant who can follow up on quotes, speak with warm leads, and convert them into confirmed bookings.



What do we offer? 

- Stable role: 6 days/week, 6 hours/day

- Starting at AUD 5/hour + commission per closed booking

- Pay growth for strong performers

- Work with an established Australian company



What will you do? 

- Follow up on moving quotes and turn them into bookings

- Reconnect with warm leads and previous inquiries

- Handle calls confidently and professionally

- Overcome objections and guide customers toward a decision



What do we expect from you?

- At least 1 year experience in sales, quote follow-up, CSR, or telemarketing

- Strong English with clear, confident communication

title: Marketing Account Specialist
description:
About Us:

Founded in 2022, Bend Marketing (
) is a boutique performance marketing and web design agency specializing in delivering high-quality services to small and medium businesses (SMBs) in digital marketing and web design. We take pride in offering tailored solutions that meet the unique needs of each client, leveraging our team's expertise and creativity to drive results and exceed expectations.



Description

Work shouldn't just be a task list and time log; it should be meaningful, memorable, and done with people you actually like. At least, that's what we believe. We're looking for someone who loves marketing, reads HubSpot blogs (or SEO LinkedIn) with their morning coffee, and is eager to grow their career in digital marketing.

If you're a people person who loves to solve problems and help others grow their businesses through online marketing, this role might be for you.

This role supports our marketing account management team by executing campaigns, analyzing performance data, and maintaining strong client relationships. You'll work closely with our Marketing Account Manager and outsourced specialists to deliver results across SEO, paid media,
 marketing, and organic social channels. This is a hands-on role where you'll gain exposure to multiple marketing disciplines while helping clients achieve their goals.

This role reports to the Director of Marketing and works alongside an awesome team of outsourced contractors.



Here are the 3 key result areas for this role...



Key Results Area #1: Execute & Support Client Marketing Campaigns

Support the management of 4-6 client accounts

Conduct regular client check-ins through Slack or

Assist with monthly reporting and client calls

Monitor campaign performance across SEO, paid media,
, and social channels

Implement campaign optimizations and A/B tests

Track and report on client KPIs and goals

Know when to escalate questions to senior tea
mbers



Key Results Area #2: Analyze Data & Optimize Performance

Pull regular performance reports from Google Analytics, ad platforms, and SEO tools

Identify trends and opportunities for improvement

Make data-driven recommendations for campaign optimization

Assist with budget tracking and pacing across paid channels

Update the Marketing Overview Spreadsheet monthly

Support the team with campaign audits and competitive analysis



Key Results Area #3: Keep Projects Organized & Moving Forward

Participate in weekly team standup meetings

Complete assigned tasks on time in the project management system

Coordinate with contractors and agencies on deliverables

Maintain organized client documentation and campaign notes

Support the Account Manager with project scoping and timeline planning

Help improve marketing processes and documentation



Requirements

2-3+ years of experience in digital marketing or account coordination

Familiarity with at least 2 of the following: SEO, paid media (Google/Meta/LinkedIn Ads),
 marketing, or social media marketing

Basic understanding of Google Analytics and marketing reporting

Strong written and verbal communication skills

Detail-oriented with excellent organizational skills

Self-motivated and comfortable working remotely

Reliable internet connection

Team player mentality with a willingness to learn



Nice to Have

SEMrush, Google Search Console, and/or Ahrefs experience

Google Analytics certification

Google Ads or Meta Ads certifications

LinkedIn Ads experience

Important: To demonstrate your attention to detail, please begin your application
 with the word LIGHTHOUSE in all caps.

HubSpot Marketing certifications

StoryBrand Framework knowledge

Experience with project management tools (Asana, ClickUp, Monday, etc.)



Benefits

Competitive hourly rate of $14 per hour based on experience (contractor status)

Work with awesome people doing meaningful work and having a lot of fun doing it

Important: To demonstrate your attention to detail, please begin your application
 with the word LIGHTHOUSE in all caps.

Opportunity to learn from experienced marketers across multiple channels

Potential for growth into Account Manager role

Must remain calm under pressure

CSR Team Lead (Remote)

title: Content Writing Specialist With SEO Expertise
description:
Applications that do not include all required items in the “How to Apply” section will not be reviewed. We value attention to detail and the ability to follow instructions—key traits for this role. If any part of this application is incomplete or missing, your submission will be automatically disregarded.?



Hi! My name is Wilson, and I run a business dedicated to helping people shop for and learn about luxury watches.



If you’re passionate about watches — their design, history, and the stories they tell — and you love writing, this is an exciting opportunity to combine both passions.



What You’ll Do

As our Content Writing Specialist, you will:



Research luxury watch topics, from brand histories (Rolex, Omega, Audemars Piguet, etc.) to technical features, buying guides, and market trends.

Create high-quality, original content for our website, blog, social media,
 newsletters, and other marketing channels.

Edit and proofread to ensure clarity, accuracy, and consistency in brand voice.

Collaborate with the team to plan content calendars and develop new content ideas.

Optimize all content for SEO, ensuring it ranks well on search engines and attracts organic traffic.

Stay up-to-date with watch industry news and SEO best practices, constantly bringing fresh ideas to the table.



You’re a Great Fit If You:

Have a genuine love for watches, luxury goods, or horology.

Have proven experience as a content writer, copywriter, or in a similar role.

Have strong writing, editing, and proofreading skills — you know how to captivate and inform.

Are skilled in SEO best practices, including keyword research and content optimization.

Are great at conducting in-depth research and translating technical details into engaging, reader-friendly content.

Are familiar with content management systems (WordPress preferred) and basic HTML (a plus).

Are independent, detail-oriented, and able to meet tight deadlines.

Have a portfolio showcasing your writing skills (bonus if it includes watch-related pieces).



Why You’ll Love Working With Us

Competitive pay plan.

Very flexible work schedule — work when and where you do your best writing.

Supportive environment that values creativity, growth, and your love of watches.

Opportunities to build a personal voice and authority in the luxury watch space.





To apply, send the following:



1. Your DISC test - Take it here - 
 - Please send a link to your results.

2. Your personality test - Take it here - 
 - Please send a link to your results.

3. Your updated resume, showcasing your most relevant experience.

4. Typing Test - Take this typing test (30 seconds): 





5. A video or videos that answer the following. Feel free to give as much information and context as possible. Also please make sure that, when you submit the video(s) links, they are in public, viewable format.



a. Tell us about yourself. Hobbies/passions. What are your career/life goals and in what amount of time?

b. Show off your work setup (computer/laptop, monitor(s), speakers, lights, etc) and tech setup - browser you use, other tech/platforms you use

c. Think of one objective you’ve had to complete in your current or previous role. Explain what metric(s) were you measured on (time spent, money saved, traffic/engagement/leads/sales, etc). Reverse engineer said objective with the target measurement in mind. Map out the process that you came up with in google docs, google sheets, or in Canva as a visual representation. How could you have made it easier/faster/better using AI?

d. What are your salary expectations from day one until the end of the first calendar year?



This is more than just a writing job — it’s a chance to help shape and tell stories about some of the most iconic and beautiful timepieces in the world.



If you’re ready to turn your passion for watches into powerful, SEO-driven content that engages and educates, apply now — I can’t wait to meet you!
